headline: Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: Ball Corporation's (NYSE: BALL) board of directors (the "Board") today declared a cash dividend of 20 cents per share, payable June 16, 2025, to shareholders of record as of June 2, 2025.

headline: The Davenport Insider Buying Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: The Davenport Insider Buying Fund (DBUYX) generated a -5.96% total return in the first quarter of 2025. Click here to read the full commentary.
